name: Availability Impact
description: This metric measures the impact on availability a successful exploit of the vulnerability will have on the target system.

values.name: Partial
values.description: Considerable lag in or interruptions in resource availability. For example, a network-based flood attack that reduces available bandwidth to a web server farm to such an extent that only a small number of connections successfully complete.

values.name: Complete
values.description: Total shutdown of the affected resource. The attacker can render the resource completely unavailable.
